item.title: iPod Integration Journey: From Dream to Modular Architecture
item.description: The Dream: Phone as Music Player iPod shipped May 2001. By May 2002, it was already a phenomenon. At Motorola Design Center Singapore, we asked: what if your phone was the iPod? Not “what if your phone had an MP3 player.” But: what if the form factor, the UX, the simplicityâ€”all of it could live in a Motorola handset? Over 15 months, I learned that modular architecture beats monolithic design every time.
